title: Karma Chameleon
description: After just barely surviving his encounter with an ingenious serial killer, Robin Wakefield is left to pick up the broken pieces of his psyche. As he does so he finds madness looming on the one hand, and remarkable new psychic abilities on the other. Can he manage the self-annealing project to emerge better than before? And what about directing these newfound superhuman and paranormal abilities toward powering his investigations as he goes after adversaries such as the world has never seen? The new Renaissance Age, taking root amidst the Dark Ages of a collapsed world economy and the moribund thinking of centralized power, brings a true carnival of bright and colorful souls into the light of day. But underneath some of the masks lurk super-powered minds that arenâ€™t exactly out to celebrate life.
author: Dean C. Moore
